title: Yearly Ward Pot Allocation for the Birley Ward

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please list the value of the Birley Ward Pot available for grant funding of organisations in each year since 2017. Also list, for each year, the organisations that received grant funding from the Ward pots, the value for each of these grants and the titles of the project that was funded.
Finally, for each year, please list the amount of money remaining in the ward pot at the end of the financial year.
Yours faithfully,
Willis Marshall

Dear Willis Marshall,
Thank you for your request for information relating to ward pot
allocations which we received on 13/12/2023.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 15/01/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
